C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
set -ex
echo "[mysqld]" > /mnt/conf.d/server-id.cnf
echo "server-id=1" >> /mnt/conf.d/server-id.cnf
echo "[mysqld]" > /mnt/conf.d/bin-logs.cnf
echo "binlog_expire_logs_seconds=259200" >> /mnt/conf.d/bin-logs.cnf
cp /mnt/config-map/master.cnf /mnt/conf.d/
initContainers.name: init-mysql

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
Prevent containers from allowing command execution
